Parent Information

We hope the following information is of use to you. If you require further information, please do not hesitate to contact the school. All of our contact information can be found on the
contact page.

*Although it is optional for students to wear certain uniform through different seasons, they are required to have a blazer, jumper, long sleeve white shirt and tie all year round for formal events and an active jacket for sporting tournaments and events.
**These uniform items are only required for students who choose to participate in the related sport.
